RISKS.LABEL: Standard PPE must be worn at CVTI: helmet, gloves, covering clothing, shoes. Cap tolerated for work in false ceilings (depending on customer's PDP). If noise is wearing noise-canceling headphones for other risks, adopt the following attitude and check the actions to be taken:
RISKS.NO_RISK: Standard PPE must be worn at CVTI: helmet, gloves, covering clothing, shoes. Cap tolerated for work in false ceilings (depending on customer's PDP). If noise, wearing noise-canceling headphones.

PDP.LIST_OF_HAZARDOUS_WORK_DESC: As a reminder, a written prevention plan must be drawn up between the user company (EU) and the external company (EE) before the start of the work in the event that the total number of working hours planned to carry out the work is at least 400 hours over 12 months, or if the work appears on the list of hazardous work set by the decree of March 19, 1993.
